subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: The project will address some needs arising from Hurricane Dean which impacted Jamaica August 19, 2007. It will support the transportation of relief supplies and coordination of relief efforts; assessments of damage, impact and losses, especially with respect to livelihoods; and the development of a recovery plan. The project will target the most severely affected communities in the parishes of Kingston & St. Andrew, St. Catherine, Clarendon, St Elizabeth and Manchester.
subproject.title: Hurricane Dean Disaster Respon
